com.joliciel.talismane

Class Talismane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.Talismane
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TalismaneServer

    public class Talismane
extends Object
    An interface for processing a Reader from TalismaneConfig.getReader() and writing the analysis result to a Writer from TalismaneConfig.getWriter().
    Not thread-safe: a single Talismane cannot be used by multiple threads simultaneously.
    The output format is determined by the processor corresponding to TalismaneConfig.getEndModule().
    This is accomplished by calling process().
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
